contents.text: A tourist is making arrangements at a travel agency for a half-day tour around an Francisco.
contents.text_zh: 一位游客正在旅行社为旧金山半日游做安排。

contents.text: Good afternoon sir,can I help you?
contents.text_zh: 先生，下午好，我能帮你吗？

contents.text: Yes， I’d like to take half-day tour around San Francisco. What do you have available?
contents.text_zh: 好的，我想参加旧金山半日游，你们这儿半日游的内容包括哪些？

contents.text: Well, we have two half-day tours daily—one in the morning from 9:30 to 12:30  and another four-hour tour in the afternoon, starting at 1:30.
contents.text_zh: 嗯，我们日常有两套半日游方案—一种是从早上9:30到12:30，另一种为下午4小时游，从下午1:30开始。

contents.text: There are two places I really want to see—one is Fisherman’s  Wharf and the other is Golden Gate Park.
contents.text_zh: 我想去两个地方看看—一个是渔人码头，另一个是金门公园。

contents.text: The morning tour does include a stop at Fisherman’s Wharf— but I’m afraid our tours don’ t include the park. You might enjoy going there on your own. You could easily spend a whole day there relaxing.
contents.text_zh: 晨游线路不包括渔人码头—但是恐怕我们的旅游线路也不包括金门公园。也许你自己去那儿更好玩些，你可以轻轻松松的在那儿呆上一整天。

contents.text: That might be a good idea. Well, I guess I’ll sign up for tomorrow morning’ s tour, anyway. Is there still room?
contents.text_zh: 真是个好主意。好了，不管怎样，我想报名参加明天的晨游，还有空座吗？

contents.text: Yes, there is. Will this be for yourself only?
No my wife and two children will also be going. The name is Peter Stone. What is the fee, by the way?
contents.text_zh: 不，我妻子和两个孩子也都去，我叫彼得.斯通。顺便问一下，费用多少？

contents.text: For adults,$10. Children under 12  go for half price, and children under three are free.
contents.text_zh: 大人每人10美元，12岁以下的儿童半价，3岁以下的儿童免费。
我的两个孩子都在12岁以下。

contents.text: There you are ... see you tomorrow!
Just a minute. Here are your tickets. And here’s some information about the tour.
contents.text_zh: 等一下，这是你的车票，还有一些关于旅游的资料。
